text: Road Transport and Highways Division() is a Bangladesh government division under the Ministry of Road Transport and Bridges responsible for roads and highways. The department is headed by Md. Nazrul Islam. ==History== Road Transport and Highways Division signed an agreement with the government of Japan worth 88 billion Taka to build three bridges and one flyover. The department drafted the Road Transport Act in 2017 which was subsequently approved by the cabinet of Bangladesh. ==References== Category:Organisations based in Dhaka Category:Government departments of Bangladesh
title: Road Transport and Highways Division
